ch.makery.address.util

Class MySqlConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.makery.address.util.DatabaseConnection
      • ch.makery.address.util.MySqlConnection

  • public class MySqlConnection
extends DatabaseConnection
    Subclass that inherits base functionality from DatabaseConnection and defines the specific connection data and drivers to be used to run queries against a MySQL/MariaDB Database.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ch.makery.address.util.DatabaseConnection

        className, conn, dbHost, dbPass, dbPort, dbSchema, dbUser

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MySqlConnection()
      Creates a connection using the default configuration data in the .MySqlConfig file.
      MySqlConnection(java.lang.String dbHost, java.lang.String dbPort, java.lang.String dbSchema, java.lang.String dbUser, java.lang.String dbPass)
      Creates a connection element but does not start it yet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Instances the Java driver for this database and opens a connection.

      • MySqlConnection

        public MySqlConnection(java.lang.String dbHost,
                       java.lang.String dbPort,
                       java.lang.String dbSchema,
                       java.lang.String dbUser,
                       java.lang.String dbPass)
        Creates a connection element but does not start it yet.
        Parameters:
        dbHost - - the address in which the server is
        dbPort - - the port for the server
        dbSchema - - the schema/database name to connect to
        dbUser - - the user for the server
        dbPass - - the password for the user
